title: MW-800/1500/4800 PMP Microwave Communication Equipment
explain: The MW-800/1500/4800 series is medium/small capacity and line-of-sight (LOS) microwave communication equipment and used for point-to-multipoint (PMP) communication between operational units and a command post within an operational radius of 25 km, e.g. army division and brigade mobile communication, communication between EW troop battalion and company units, as well as between ground-air missile troop battalion and launcher units.
features:
Functions

  • Service: voice, data and IP data
  • Encryption
  • EOW
  • BITE
  • Network management and monitor &control

Features

  • Operation mode：Point-to-point, point-to-multipoint.
  • ECCM： Jam-triggered frequency change, FEC, and LPI.
  • RelayBoth central station and remote station can be operated as relay station
  • Flexible operation： stationary or installed on off-road vehicle
form:
Specifications
MW-800MW-1500MW-4800
Communication distance 25 km (LOS)
Number of address1-10 (configurable)
Multi-address modeTDM/TDMA/PAMA
Operation frequency610-960 MHz1350-1850 MHz4400-5000 MHz
Tx power≥37 dBm
Rx threshold level≤-93 dBm (2048 kbps，BER=1×10-6)≤-86 dBm (8448 kbps，BER=1×10-6)
Transmission capacityPTP： 256kbps~8448kbps
4 x2048kbps（1 point to 4 points）；6x512kbps+1x2048kbps（1 point to 7 points）10x512kbps（1 point to 10 points）
Services Voice, data, IP
Rx-Tx interval90 MHz120 MHz
Frequency steps100 kHz or 125 kHz1 MHz
